languages.text: "Ты же знаешь, что можешь просто попросить о том, что тебе нужно, и получишь?"
"You know you can simply ask for what you want and you will get it?"
languages.original_text: "Ты же знаешь, что можешь просто попросить о том, что тебе нужно, и получишь?"

traits.locale_text: "You know you can simply ask for what you want and you will get it?"
"You know you can simply ask for what you want and you will get it?"
"You know you can simply ask for what you want and you will get it?"
"You know you can simply ask for what you want and you will get it?"

languages.text: “你想要什么，只要和我开口就好。你应该是知道的吧？”
languages.original_text: "You know you can simply ask for what you want and you will get it?"

traits.locale_text: “你想要什么，只要和我开口就好。你应该是知道的吧？”

languages.text: 「欲しい物を求めれば、それが手に入ることを知っているのか？」
languages.original_text: "You know you can simply ask for what you want and you will get it?"

traits.locale_text: 「欲しい物を求めれば、それが手に入ることを知っているのか？」

languages.text: «Sabe que no tiene más que pedirme lo que quiera y se lo daré, ¿no?».
languages.original_text: "You know you can simply ask for what you want and you will get it?"

traits.locale_text: «Sabe que no tiene más que pedirme lo que quiera y se lo daré, ¿no?».

languages.text: « Vous savez que vous pouvez simplement me demander ce que vous voulez pour l'obtenir ? »
languages.original_text: "You know you can simply ask for what you want and you will get it?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez que vous pouvez simplement me demander ce que vous voulez pour l'obtenir ? »

languages.text: "Ihr wisst schon, dass Ihr auch einfach darum bitten könnt, um das zu bekommen, was Ihr wollt?"
languages.original_text: "You know you can simply ask for what you want and you will get it?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wisst schon, dass Ihr auch einfach darum bitten könnt, um das zu bekommen, was Ihr wollt?"

languages.text: "Ne istediğini söylemenin yeterli olduğunu biliyorsun, değil mi? Alırsın istediğini."
languages.original_text: "You know you can simply ask for what you want and you will get it?"

traits.locale_text: "Ne istediğini söylemenin yeterli olduğunu biliyorsun, değil mi? Alırsın istediğini."
